alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 7:22PM CST until February 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Kinder. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of wooded areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Saturday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Saturday was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Calcasieu River Kinder 16.0 16.2 Sat 7 pm CST 16.1 15.8 15.5 &&
